p: PrEP refers to HIV medication that is taken by HIV-negative people to reduce their risk of infection. Currently, Truvada is the only drug approved for the use of PrEP globally. PrEP works by stopping the viral replication of HIV and if used consistently, can overwhelmingly reduce the risk of HIV transmission. Drug resistance has also been found to be very low (<0.1%), [ 7] while observational studies have found that the impact of PrEP on kidney toxicity is also very low. [ 54]
